structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.text: After the body has been dissected it shall be decently buried or cremated and decently buried at the expense of the professor to whom it was delivered, or of the college represented by him.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1 -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2647.
